attributes.additional_details: today i have read a story highlighted in a british tabloid which seems to be beyond beleif, A FAMILY THAT WON 10 MILLION POUNDS ON THE NATIONAL LOTTERY WRE STILL CLAIMING DLA FROM THE HARD WORKING TAX PAYER, AND HAVE DONE SO FOR THE PAST 5 YEARS AFTER THEIR WIN THEY RECEIVE 500 POUNDS A MONTH AN HAVE A BRAND NEW CAR SUPPLIED WHICH IS REPLACED EVERY 3 YEARS. Do they really need this handout and can the country really afford it, this cannot be fair future dla need to be meanstested.
